text: The 2008 Spengler Cup was held in Davos, Switzerland between December 26, 2008 and December 31, 2008. All matches were played at host HC Davos's home Vaillant Arena. The final was won 5-3 by HC Dynamo Moscow over Team Canada. ==Teams participating== * Team Canada * HC Davos (host) * ERC Ingolstadt * HC Energie Karlovy Vary * HC Dynamo Moscow ==Tournament== ===Round-Robin results=== {| class="wikitable" |- !width=180|Team !width=20|GP !width=20|W !width=20|L !width=20|OTW !width=20|OTL !width=20|GF !width=20|GA !width=20|PTS |- style="background:#ccffcc;" |style="text-align:left;"| Team Canada |4||3||0||0||1||19||12||7 |- style="background:#ccffcc;" |style="text- align:left;"| HC Dynamo Moscow |4||3||1||0||0||18||14||6 |- style="background:#ffffff;" |style="text-align:left;"| HC Davos |4||1||2||1||0||14||14||4 |- style="background:#ffffff;" |style="text- align:left;"| |4||1||3||0||0||10||13||2 |- style="background:#ffffff;" |style="text-align:left;"| ERC Ingolstadt |4||1||3||0||0||12||20||2 |} All times local (CET/UTC +1) ===Finals=== ==References== ==External links== *Spenglercup.ch 2008–09 Category:2008–09 in Swiss ice hockey Category:2008–09 in Czech ice hockey Category:2008–09 in Canadian ice hockey Category:2008–09 in German ice hockey Category:2008–09 in Russian ice hockey
